name: Spicy Baked Feta (Feta Psiti)
author: Diana Moutsopoulos
summary: This is such an easy appetizer that never fails to impress!  People are familiar with feta, but this traditional Greek way of preparing is not as well known.  The salty/sour taste of the feta offsets the heat of the chili flakes - so don't be afraid to load them on! Serve with crusty bread or toast.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons crushed red pepper flakes, or as needed
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place the feta in an ovenproof baking dish
Cover liberally with pepper flakes, and sprinkle with oregano
Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until feta is soft, about 10 minutes
